response.job_title: Sales representative Home and Personal Care in Rocsa Colombia an AZELIS Company
response.summary:
Chemical engineer with experience in the commercial area, with soft skills focused on B2B relationships. My career involves a complete approach to the supply chain, working on sales and purchases simultaneously.

Through my jobs and projects, I have acquired technical knowledge and experience for personal care and home care business, ceramics, Oil & Gas, and Fragrance Industry, which give me a multidisciplinary perspective of the markets,

I am used to work in highly competitive environments and multidisciplinary teams. I have excellent interpersonal skills and I always want to make a new friendship from every new business.
response.skills: Ventas, Negociación, Inglés comercial, Relaciones interpersonales, Negocios internacionales, Habilidades sociales, Resolución de problemas, Español, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Liderazgo de equipos, Gestión de proyectos, Trabajo en equipo, Investigación, Control de calidad, Ingeniería, Capacidad de análisis, Comunicación interpersonal, Inglés, Gestión de datos

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for seeking, maintaining and improving a customer portfolio, providing technical support for the development of new projects with specialties and commodities, working on behalf of Rocsa as representative for different global manufacturers. Sales of $2,4 MUSD per year.
Responsible for raw materials purchasing, which amounts to more than $300K USD/month in orders. Finally, responsible for carrying out market exploratory processes and start of operations in Ecuador.
profile_positions.title: Sales representative

company.name: TCH HEAVY OIL SERVICES S A

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the laboratory area and for giving support in a pilot plant, I worked supporting projects in Oil&Gas industry with the finally to improve transportation of Colombian heavy crude oil with the use of cavitation technology (Ukrainian technology) for sale.
profile_positions.title: Laboratory Analyst

profile_positions.description: Internship in charge of a project to standardize, analyze and propose improvements in production processes and quality control area.

profile_positions.description: Research and development, responsible for carrying out a project which helped to facilitate raw materials logistics in plant, control in process lines with a secondary objective to reduce energy costs.
profile_positions.title: Technical area Intern (R+D)

profile_positions.description: Monitor de clases de Transferencia de Masa y Operaciones de Separación. Mis funciones consistían en dar soporte a los profesores encargados de dictar cada una de estas asignaturas. Este soporte fue ayuda en calificaciones, en desarrollo de planes de trabajo, ayuda con proyectos relacionados con la asignatura, entre otros.
profile_positions.title: Monitor

profile_positions.description: Trabaje dentro de la universidad como personal de soporte en auditorios y equipos del edificio de ingeniería, así como brindando atención al personal de la universidad nacional sobre aspectos académicos y logísticos.
profile_positions.title: Soporte técnico y atención a personal
